chapter.title: GitHub specific features
chapter.para: Hydra contains some features that hook into GitHub APIs or receive updates from GitHub.

section.title: Authenticating to GitHub
section.para: The GitHubStatus plugin and GitHubPulls plugin can both use the same configuration for authentication. The GitHubPulls plugin doesn't require authentication for public repos, but will use it when the configuration exists.
The configuration can be done per-repo, per-owner or globally. The examples show what what should be added to the config in each case:
section.programlisting:
# Per repo config <github_authorization_file_repo> <NixOS> hydra = "/run/hydra_repo_token" </NixOS> </github_authorization_file_repo>
# Per owner config <github_authorization_file_owner> NixOS = "/run/hydra_token" </github_authorization_file_owner>
# Global config github_authorization_file = "/run/hydra_token"

note.para: GitHub authorization will fall back to the global config if the owner or repo specific configurations cannot be found.
